mother_idea.speaker: Mother
mother_idea.text: You know what this calls for? A celebration. A proper one. We should invite everyone who's been touched by Dragon Haven.

player_considers.speaker: Narrator
player_considers.text: You think of all the friends you've made - Marcus, Lily, Garrett, Vera, the Noble, Elena, Thomas. Each of them found something special here.

mother_excited.speaker: Mother
mother_excited.text: *Her eyes light up* We'll prepare the finest feast this cafe has ever seen! Dragon Haven will live up to its name.

mother_confident.speaker: Mother
mother_confident.text: For you? For what you've done for each of them? *She smiles knowingly* They'll come from across the realm if they must.

sending_word.speaker: Narrator
sending_word.text: Over the next few days, you send word to all your friends. Your dragon personally delivers some of the invitations, delighting in the task.

marcus_reply.speaker: Narrator
marcus_reply.text: Marcus sends word from a distant town - he'll be there, with stories from his latest adventures.

lily_reply.speaker: Narrator
lily_reply.text: Lily responds immediately, offering to help prepare the feast. Her standards may be high, but so is her generosity.

garrett_reply.speaker: Narrator
garrett_reply.text: Garrett's reply brings tears to your eyes - he's bringing flowers from his wife's garden. His way of sharing her memory with you.

vera_reply.speaker: Narrator
vera_reply.text: Captain Vera sends a single word: 'Anchored.' You know she'll be there.

noble_reply.speaker: Narrator
noble_reply.text: The Noble's acceptance arrives on perfumed paper, with a promise to finally reveal who they really are.

siblings_reply.speaker: Narrator
siblings_reply.text: Elena and Thomas reply together - the first letter they've written jointly in years. Reconciliation truly is possible.

preparations.speaker: Mother
preparations.text: *Surveying the cafe* We have much to prepare. This will be a celebration they'll never forget.

end_scene.speaker: Narrator
end_scene.text: Your dragon helps arrange tables while you and Mother plan the menu. Dragon Haven Cafe has never felt more alive with possibility.
